name: places/ChIJoWk_7bxYwokRVPaD7Kqv1hQ
formattedAddress: 150 East 86th St, New York, NY 10028, USA
adrFormatAddress: 150 East 86th St, New York, NY 10028, USA

editorialSummary.text: Chain retailer supplying on-trend clothing, swimwear, accessories & shoes.

originalText.text: If I could give 0 stars I would, this store is very unprofessional when it comes to the store manager and how they treat the staff there. Only reason I’m leaving 3 stars is because all the employees are always very helpful whenever I go, and seeing as how this happens to be the closest H&M to me I go pretty often. There have been a handful of times where the store manager is seen scolding her employees right in front of customers as if no one’s there in front of them, as I read recent reviews about how the store manager has done this on different occasions I realized how often this must be happening. Hopefully they find someone else quickly who actually knows how to be a manager and hopefully someone with decent simple manners.

originalText.text: Fast fashion at its finest. A wide choice of clothing with attentive sales staff and duds were perfectly positioned, stocked with ample sizes. One of Manhattan's smallest sites and now one of our favorites. An ideal location for picking up some basic pieces needed in most closets.

text.text: Fast fashion at its finest. A wide choice of clothing with attentive sales staff and duds were perfectly positioned, stocked with ample sizes. One of Manhattan's smallest sites and now one of our favorites. An ideal location for picking up some basic pieces needed in most closets.

originalText.text: I use to be an employee here and recently came back to visit and honestly… it worse than before. The STORE manager still yells at her employees on the sales floor and have no respect for them… i literally watched her yell to her supervisor as other customers watched as well. Nothing has changed and I feel sorry for whoever still works there. This store does not like their employees and that’s why I left.

Nothing has changed and I feel sorry for whoever still works there. This store does not like their employees and that’s why I left.

originalText.text: Im giving this store 3 stars because the staff was super helpful the day i was there. However I honestly feel really bad for them. I was is the store making a purchase and was witness to a female manger with a short black bob practically yelling at this really short female employee. It was really uncomfortable to watch because no managment should be talking to anyone that way. I asked an employee about it and she said the girl she was yelling at was their supervisor. I prey they find a better manager. Nobody should even be addressing staff on the floor like that.

originalText.text: This location has a great selection of clothes and ample sizes. It's just that they do need more staff. I stood online waiting to pay for an item and also pick up an online order for over 25 minutes. I have to say the young man that was checking everyone out was exceptionally professional and patient. I would have lost my cool 5 times over. Management needs to do better. You can't have a line almost 20 people deep with just 1 person on the register. That's just horrible customer service.
